0.challengetext: It's great to have a full mag loaded in your gun, but what's loaded in your playlist? Time to ramp it up.
0.goaltext: Kill One Million enemies with the whisky bottle during the Road to Crimefest event.

1.goaltext: Zip-tie 300,000 civilians during the Road to Crimefest event.

2.goaltext: Complete heists where you manufacture illegal drugs 70,000 times during the Road to Crimefest event.

3.goaltext: Complete 50,000 heists with a vault during the Road to Crimefest event.

4.challengetext: Robert's Bank has seen plenty of action with both sides of the law using CAR-4's and AK Rifles. There's nothing like a classic bank job with some classic firearms, so get out there and cause demolition, 20,000 times.
4.goaltext: Complete 20,000 GO Bank heists while using the CAR-4 Rifle or the AK Rifle during the Road to Crimefest event.

5.challengetext: Winter in Donetsk? Very cold. Take this.
5.goaltext: Complete 2,500 Watchdogs heists with your personal accuracy above 70% during the Road to Crimefest.

6.challengetext: Every enterprise needs a solid foundation. Unleashing 700 rounds-per-minute is an enterprise, right?
6.goaltext: Earn 100,000,000,000 experience during the Road to Crimefest event.

7.challengetext: Improve the cops' view with a taste of Ukrainian riot control.
7.goaltext: Eliminate the rat on the Hoxton Revenge heist 40,000 times during the Road to Crimefest event.

8.challengetext: Much majestic, such hidden, very wow
8.goaltext: Complete the Framing Frame heist 30,000 times during the Road to Crimefest event.

9.goaltext: Help Vlad's brother in law escape 20,000 times on White Xmas during the Road to Crimefest event.

10.challengetext: Sometimes you just need a few extra guns and people to carry them. Turn 80,000 cops from law enforcers to your enforcers using the Joker skill.
10.goaltext: Convert 80,000 law enforcers to fight on your side using the Joker Skill during the Road to Crimefest.

11.challengetext: You're not strangers to the news cameras. So when you're the 6pm criminal superstar, make sure you move with grace and elan.
11.goaltext: Steal the warheads for Vlad in the Meltdown heist 100,000 times during the Road to Crimefest event.

12.goaltext: Kill 70,000 Bulldozers with submachine guns during the Road to Crimefest event. (The percentage of the Twitter challenge progress is counted towards this goal!)

13.goaltext: Earn $3,000,000,000,000 during the Road to Crimefest event.

14.challengetext: Commissioner Garrett is ramping up the forces of law and order. Show 'Old Thunderguts' the power of truly organized crime. Let him see rank upon rank of masked heisters, and get 30,000 concurrent players online.
14.goaltext: Reach a peak of 30,000 players playing PAYDAY 2 online at the same time during the Road to Crimefest event.

15.challengetext: It's dangerous out there. Wear this.
15.goaltext: Defeat Captain Winters' squadmembers 150,000 times during the Road to Crimefest event.

16.challengetext: The shield has been carried on the battlefield for milennia. The shotgun... less so. Introduce the ancient and the modern styles of warfare by shotgunning 250,000 Shields.
16.goaltext: Kill 250,000 Shields with shotguns during the Road to Crimefest event.

17.goaltext: Help Hoxton break into the FBI and steal the server 120,000 of times during the Road to Crimefest event. (The percentage of the Twitter challenge progress is counted towards this goal!)

18.challengetext: This one will make you feel like your heart is bursting from your chest.
18.goaltext: Kill 15,000,000 enemies during the Road to Crimefest event.

19.challengetext: The sport of baseball is known as the world's greatest test of endurance and fortitude...of the viewer. Liven things up by slaying a cool 1,000,000 gangsters with a baseball bat during the Road to Crimefest. Batter up!
19.goaltext: Kill 1,000,000 gangsters with any baseball bat during the Road to Crimefest event.

20.challengetext: The taser is one of Commissioner Garrett's favorite units. He has a compilation tape of their highlights, titled "Takedown by Tasers", which he plays to cheer himself up. Put together a lowlight tape for him, by pulling the plug on 4,000,000 tasers.
20.goaltext: Kill 4,000,000 Tasers during the Road to Crimefest event.

21.challengetext: In order to truly test the best in this Crimefest, complete 250,000 heists on Death Wish difficulty.
21.goaltext: Complete 250,000 heists on the Death Wish difficulty during the Road to Crimefest event

22.challengetext: You have to be in it to win it. Show your participation by completing any 20 Crimefest challenges during the Road to Crimefest event.
22.goaltext: Complete 20 Crimefest challenges during the Road to Crimefest event

24.challengetext: "After the excitement of finding Cagliostro's dungeon, I couldn't sleep. Spent an hour upgrading Crime.Net."
24.goaltext:
Kill 2,000,000 cloak
ers during the Road to Crimefest event.
